definition: any pigment producing the orange color, of the color between red and yellow
details:
noun
- any pigment producing the orange color
- orange color or pigment
= synonyms: orangeness
- round yellow to orange fruit of any of several citrus trees
- any citrus tree bearing oranges
= synonyms: orange tree
adjective
- of the color between red and yellow
= example: of the color between red and yellow
= synonyms: orangish
